name: Wendy Defore
description: I am a gentle, easy-going, sexual and family-oriented lady. I like to bring home comfort and hospitality. I am a rather good listener. I cannot say that I really like big noisy companies, I prefer romantic atmosphere more. I love animals and nature, my pets bring me happiness! I am a very positive person, cheerful and I look forward to a new day, giving thanks to God. I do believe in real love and I genuinely believe that I can meet my love here, on this site. I do not care age difference, as inner world of the person is the most important for me.I am looking for a kind, gentle and romantic person. But first of all I appreciate honesty. I want to find a man who will respect me and treat me very well. I want to have a family where feelings are in the first place. I promise to do my best to be the best wife in the world.
